app:control.yt:state: Syndication of this video was restricted.

entry.title: OK Kanmani - Kaara Aattakkaara Lyric Video | A.R. Rahman, Mani Ratnam
entry.content:
Listen to 'Kaara Aattakaara' from O Kadhal Kanmani sung by Aaryan Dinesh Kanagaratnam, Darshana & Shashaa Tirupati. The simple yet beautifully structured song hits you like a chill breeze, with lyrics by Aaryan Dinesh Kanagaratnam, Mani Ratnam & A.R. Rahman.
Song Name - Kaara Aattakkaara Movie - O Kadhal Kanmani Singer - Aaryan Dinesh Kanagaratnam, Darshana & Shashaa Tirupati Music - A.R. Rahman Lyrics - Aaryan Dinesh Kanagaratnam, Mani Ratnam, A.R. Rahman Director - Mani Ratnam Starring - Dulquer Salmaan, Nithya Menen Producer - Mani Ratnam, Suhasini Mani Ratnam Studio - Madras Talkies Music Label - Sony Music Entertainment India Pvt. Ltd.
© 2015 Sony Music Entertainment India Pvt. Ltd.
Subscribe: Vevo - http://www.youtube.com/user/sonymusicindiavevo?sub_confirmation=1 Like us: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SonyMusicSouth Follow us: Twitter: https://twitter.com/SonyMusicSouth G+: https://plus.google.com/+SonyMusicIndia
